item.description:
Shamballa Multi-Dimensional Healing

Witches have always had the ability to do hands-on healing,
Now you can too! :)

Level One Class- Hands on Healing
Saturday, July 29, 2008
From 7:00- 9:30


Included in the class each student receives a Shamballa booklet, class notes, and practice with hands-on energy healing, and a certificate.

Students are also eligible to become certified with the Shamballa Foundation.
The FIRST class will be offered to Meet-up members for a special introductory price of $35.00 per person. Classes are usually $50.00.

There are (4) levels to the Master Degree, with is equivalent to a Reiki Master Degree.

Level l - Heal Yourself & Others Hands On - July 19th
Level ll- Long Distance Healing- August 9th
Level lll- Attune To Level l Only - August 30th
Level lV- Master Teacher- Attune & teach all Levels- September 6th
______________________________________
You may take just one level, or all four to Master
If the student wishes to continue, levels 2 through 4 will be $50.00 for each class

Each level builds upon the other, and you must take each level before continuing on.
I must have at least (4) students to be able to do the classes, with a limit of seven. Fee is due upon beginning of class
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
What is Shamballa?

SHAMBALLA IS THE ENERGY BEYOND REIKI.....

We have finally reached a collective consiousness
to be able to bring in this more powerful healing energy.

Shamballa is an extension of Reiki and means
"Unconditional Love"

And unconditional love, is meant to be spread around the planet.
Shamballa is not just meant for so called,
"Healers", it is meant for EVERYONE.
Shamballa is for anyone who wants to become
"whole" and who wants to heal themselves at
all levels: Physically, Mentally, Emotionally,
and Spiritually.

Shamballa can break addictions, releases negative karma, and helps people to "awaken" and "remember" why they have come here.

It helps to raise your vibration, gives you spiritual "gifts" and helps one to spiritually evolve.

And I believe, that when each one of us,
spiritually evolves, we then therefore help to raise the whole
"Collective Consciousness", and we ALL to evolve.

For more information about Shamballa check out my website at:
http://www.shamballaa....
item.how_to_find_us: Come in the door and we will be there!
item.name: Shamballa / Reiki Healing Class- Level 1
